body:
i am trying to run Energy plus although i have constructed the zone very well.

Can someone please help? please see attached files.

Regards,

Semaan
topic: Energy plus is giving an error, please help....

replies.body:
Hi Mustapha,

When I run EP it turns red. Can you please check the attached file.

Actually, I am trying to get the cooling loads for before and after applying a mashrabiya screen that is offset 1.8m from the facade.

I am doing this for a Masters Dissertation. I am also getting an error when plugging the mashrabiya surfaces into the EPcontext input. Eventually the cooling load should go down but it isnt at the moment.

I would really appreciate if you can check it.

regards,

Jalal
